inputs.name: auto_delete_disk
inputs.description: Whether or not the nfs disk should be auto-deleted

inputs.name: deployment_name
inputs.description: Name of the HPC deployment, used as name of the NFS instace if no name is specified.

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: the VM image used by the nfs server

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Labels to add to the NFS instance. List key, value pairs.

inputs.name: local_mounts
inputs.description: Mountpoint for this NFS compute instance

inputs.name: machine_type
inputs.description: Type of the VM instance to use

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: The resource name of the instance.

inputs.name: network_name
inputs.description: Network to deploy to. Only one of network or subnetwork should be specified.

inputs.name: scopes
inputs.description: Scopes to apply to the controller

inputs.name: service_account
inputs.description: Service Account for the NFS Server

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: The service tier of the instance.

inputs.name: zone
inputs.description: The zone name where the nfs instance located in.

outputs.name: network_storage
outputs.description: export of all desired folder directories
